DOC.brief_title: Effect Prenatal Education Perceptions Epidural Acceptance
DOC.detailed_description: Racial/ethnic disparity exist proportion patient receive epidural analgesia . The purpose study determine culturally-sensitive educational program target woman ' perception epidural increase acceptance intrapartum epidural use .
